comment: Jews are a direct threat to America. Jews are loyal to Jews, regardless of the host nation they're in. The Jewish lobby, think-tanks & over representation in our Government, Courts, Hollywood & the Media, have led to degeneracy, miscegenation, despair, mega debt & wars based on lies. Jews holding any political office, or control in media, must be outlawed.
amr:
# ::snt Jews are a direct threat to America. Jews are loyal to Jews, regardless of the host nation they're in. The Jewish lobby, think-tanks & over representation in our Government, Courts, Hollywood & the Media, have led to degeneracy, miscegenation, despair, mega debt & wars based on lies. Jews holding any political office, or control in media, must be outlawed.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / threaten-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (r / religious-group
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :ARG2 (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "America"))
            :ARG1-of (d / direct-02))
      :snt2 (l / loyal-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / religious-group
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Jew"))
            :ARG2 r2
            :ARG1-of (r3 / regardless-91
                  :ARG2 (n4 / nation
                        :mod (h / host)
                        :location-of r2)))
      :snt3 (l2 / lead-03
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (l3 / lobby-01
                        :ARG0 r2)
                  :op2 (t2 / think-tank)
                  :op3 (r4 / represent-01
                        :ARG0 r2
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / we)))
                              :op2 (c2 / court)
                              :op3 (m2 / market-sector
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Hollywood"))
                              :op4 (m3 / media))
                        :mod (o / over)))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / degenerate-01)
                  :op2 (m4 / miscegenation)
                  :op3 (d3 / despair-01)
                  :op4 (d4 / debt
                        :mod (m5 / mega))
                  :op5 (w2 / war-01
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                              :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (l4 / lie-08)))))
            :snt4 (o2 / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (o3 / outlaw-01
                        :ARG1 (o4 / or
                              :op1 (h2 / hold-01
                                    :ARG0 r2
                                    :ARG1 (o5 / office
                                          :mod (p2 / politics)
                                          :mod (a4 / any)))
                              :op2 (c3 / control-01
                                    :ARG0 r2
                                    :ARG1 (m6 / media)))))))

comment: Please use less offensive language when describing others.
amr:
# ::snt Please use less offensive language when describing others.
(u / use-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (l / language
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (o / offend-01
                        :ARG0 l)
                  :ARG3 (l2 / less)))
      :time (d / describe-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (o2 / other)))

comment: Just because someone is not as smart as you doesn't mean they are less intelligent than you.
amr:
# ::snt Just because someone is not as smart as you doesn't mean they are less intelligent than you.
(m / mean-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 (s / someone)
            :ARG2 (s2 / smart-06
                  :ARG1 s)
            :ARG3 (e / equal
                  :polarity -)
            :ARG4 (y / you))
      :ARG2 (h2 / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 s
            :ARG2 (ii / intelligent-01
                  :ARG1 s)
            :ARG3 (l / less)
            :ARG4 y)
      :mod (j / just))
